ygData.subject: Re: OOC: Two years ago....
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: WARNING, THIS POST WASTES TIME. I don t see why you have to try to defend yourself against invisible attacks, Dewey. Are you that insecure? I d be busy

Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

OOC: WARNING, THIS POST WASTES TIME.

I don't see why you have to try to de=
fend yourself against invisible attacks, Dewey. Are you that insecure? I'd =
be busy telling everyone that the nWo robbed me and attempted to downgrade =
me and they must be destroyed, but you're more concerned about someone thin=
king that you're gay. When we say faggot, we're not talking about the "gay"=
 faggot, but rather the "I hate you" kind of faggot. As for girls, I've alw=
ays respected girls. I've always treated them like humans and actually thin=
k that boys are the gross ones. Hey, if I could have made a choice of what =
to start as, I'd have picked a girl, but that doesn't mean I'm gay. In fact=
, playing with My Little Ponies doesn't mean you're gay. I dream about one =
day finding a perfect woman to love every day. I've actually never thought =
about sex, though, aside from wanting to have children. I believe that pre =
marital sex is a top relationship buster, so I try to keep my mind off of s=
uch things. I consider myself a good clean person. Like anyone cares about =
me, though, I'm evil. Oh, but I'm evil is a good wholesome sort of way. Wai=
t. What was this post supposed to be about again?

If I made you feel "dirt=
y" or gay, Dewboy, I'm sorry, it wasn't my intention. My intention was to k=
ick your ass for thrashing Airly for her language. She speaks English just =
fine, if you ask me, and I seen no mistake in her post. "Long life to NBW" =
made perfect sense. You can say to someone "Long life to you!" and it makes=
 perfect sense. It's good use of the language...

  ----- Original Message =
-----
  From: Eric Bischoff
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
  Sent: Tuesday, S=
eptember 17, 2002 8:13 PM
  Subject: Re: OOC: Two years ago....


  OOC:   =
Kyle, why does it matter if the nWo is on the council?  That would suck if =
we were, because we are better than the council.  And in a manner of speaki=
ng, we sort of are on the council, it's just that rAuq is too woman to admi=
t he's part of the nWo.  And, about girls, I never thought girls were "icky=
".  But I never had fantasies either.  Girls are girls, women are women, th=
ey don't mean a thing to me.  I don't want to share my life with ANYBODY, a=
nd I certainly don't want to share my future fame and fortune with anybody =
but my co-workers who will also be getting fame and fortune.  They know who=
 they are.  In fact, some of my future co-workers are getting fame and fort=
une right now.


  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms=
 of Service.
